description: Landing page with age/location gate before entering the main Luo Medical site

contentSequences.description: Eyebrow text 'Enter Your Details' followed by large italic heading 'Illuminate Possibilities'
Location dropdown with label 'Where are you located?' and Canadian provinces
Age verification with date of birth dropdowns (DD/MM/YYYY)
Remember me checkbox and 'Enter Luo' call-to-action button

blockCollectionAvailable.name: Hero
blockCollectionAvailable.purpose: Large heading, text, and CTA buttons for page introductions

blockCollectionAvailable.name: Cards
blockCollectionAvailable.purpose: Grid of items with images, headings, and descriptions

notes: This is a gateway/landing page that acts as an age and location verification gate
The page has interactive form elements (dropdowns, checkbox, submit button)
The visual design features a striking purple-to-blue gradient background
Form functionality would require JavaScript implementation beyond markdown
For migration, focus on content structure; form interactivity is separate concern
